title: Dynamic Hate Speech Detection
description: Hate speech classification with fine-grained type labels based on the Dynamically Generated Hate Speech Dataset (Vidgen et al., ACL 2021). Classify content as hateful or not, then identify hate type (animosity, derogation, dehumanization, threatening, support for hateful entities) and target group.
